Name: Jerry Colangelo
Note: As owner, executive, and head coach (1970; 1972–73).

Name: Cotton Fitzsimmons
Note: As head coach; inducted in the Suns' Ring of Honor posthumously.

Name: John MacLeod
Note: As head coach. Also served as assistant head coach in the 1999–2000 NBA season.

Name: Larry Weinberg
Note: As team founder and owner; number still available.

Name: Jack Ramsay
Note: As head coach; the number represents the 1977 NBA Championship he won while coaching the Blazers.

Name: Nate Archibald
Note: During his career with the team, it was known first as the Cincinnati Royals (1970–1972), then the Kansas City–Omaha Kings (1972–1975), and finally as the Kansas City Kings (1975–1976). He also briefly wore No. 10 at one point.
